verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ah Lord God, Thou hast made the heavens and the earth By Thy great power. Ah Lord God, Thou hast made the heavens and the earth{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}By Thine outstretched arm. Nothing is too difficult for Thee, Nothing is too difficult for Thee. Great and mighty God,{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
